instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message: Clean board, came in with an X on the battery, replaced D7050 and the ISL, now battery is recognized and charges fine, but when the charger is disconnected the Mac runs for about 1-3 minutes then shuts down even with the battery holding a %50+ charge.

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message: Run corresponding EFI ASD and check if any error pops up.

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message: No errors come up in ASD EFI, problem still present as soon as I disconnect the charger.

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message: Did you test with known good battery?

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message: Yes, same behavior with know good battery.

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message:
Post exact resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7100.
Run HWMonitor and check current indications.

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message:
Ok I reballed the SMC and now it is working fine. 

Thanks!

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message: Resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of U7100 were all correct, I checked that from the start, same with the known working battery, only thing that made a difference was reballing the SMC.

threads.title: 820-3476 only last 1-3 minutes with battery
threads.message:
Thanks for feedback.
Strange issue, maybe someone else gets help here in the future...
